reviews.text: Quick service, I travel to london every day from here and the staff are always friendly.
Super helpful staff. Helped me when I lost my season ticket!

Tunbridge wells train station have Rude unhelpful staff I pay £6500 for a ticket each year to have staff be rude and answer back even when you pay a compliment. I was shocked by the last lady’s reply when I thanked her for opening the gate when my ticket didn’t work. Telling me that I should get there earlier!?

An important SouthEastern train station, with incredibly regular trains in all directions and helpful staff and announcements. :)

- - - - - -
Platform 1 is almost always for stopping (and occasionally express) services to London Charing Cross and London Cannon Street. Platform 2 is generally for terminating services from London, and for services to Hastings. This platform is often used for a morning London express train.

Often, trains to Hastings will divide at Tunbridge Wells. If the train says it is dividing it is generally the front 4 coaches which will continue to Hastings. Make sure to check as to whether your Hastings service will be a stopping service or an express.

A coffee shop is available on Platform 1.
